title: rolling a champ i already rolled
body:
As title i was first given lucian which i swapped with team, got amumu in exchange
Rolled mumu and was given braum, which another team member wanted for his taric
Bored of playing tanks i rolled again only to be given mumu again
out of 1000+ games of ARAM this was the first time i experienced this
anyone else had this happen to them?

replies.body: That, I must say was very unfortunate of you
I had sivir, rerolled cause we had 4 adc's, swapped with a teammates, he rerolled and got sivir.
i got rengar swapped with a teammate. he got kha. we both roll. i get rengar he got kha
